name: Blambo II
description:
Submitted to BTP Jam 3. Theme: "Less is More".

Blambo II

Controls:

WASD, Space to Jump, Point and Click to shoot.

Blambo's enemies have gotten their hands on an experimental attack harrier. It's Blambo's job to blow them out of the sky! 

This game is made from 100% original assets.

Art:

Lemonthunder
